entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1100 metres. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few rain showers and flurries beginning near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of thunderstorms late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
